title: ● The morning of the youth of mankind was removed because of one complaint
subtitle: In 2015, the United Kingdom City Council removed the tombstone that marked the burial of a 4-year-old boy because it did not conform to the standards of the cemetery.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A grave witness who symbolized the burial site of a 4-year-old boy was removed because his appearance violated the rules of the cemetery.
